name: Mio the Gamer
description: TenshiGirl.io is a crypto trading platform and NFT collectible trading card project, built on Ethereum. They are bridging world renowned artists to create the world of Vestrianâ€” a narrative filled with rich characters, storylines and battle between factions. Mio was designed by Irvin Ryan Tiu, an up-and-coming anime artist who's been drawing professionally for seven years, and has worked with TouchTalent and Dreamwork STV. His smooth and fresh style, hitting all the high notes of classic anime, make him a great addition to our team of artists.

attributes.value: Anime, World of Vestrian, Collectible Trading Cards, Dynamic Scarcity, In-Game Functionality
